name: sbf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0), wnf(s1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wnf(s1, w0), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wnf(s1, w0), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0))

body.origin: |- wi(wnf(s1, w0), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)

comment: Substitution for a variable not free in a wff does not affect it. For a version requiring disjoint variables but fewer axioms, see ~ sbv . (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.)
